Desc.eng: Look! That was a classic Borgovian hold-up. This man must have been a merchant. Hey, you are not trying to loot him, are you?
Why are you so squeamish? We could find something that tells us who he was.
Fine. Let's see if he carried something useful.
Not much. A letter, signed by someone called John, and a list of the goods.
Impressive list. Jewelry, weapons, expensive silks. Can we go now?
Of course not. What do you take me for?
